title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-9.4 - Certification of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-9.4 - Certification of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions

State Regulations

The legislative body of the special assessing unit shall
determine the base percentage, the current percentage and the current base
proportion for each class and for each portion class and the clerk of the
legislative body shall certify the same to ORPTS as provided in section
1803-a
of the Real Property Tax

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-9.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
